about_the_game:
Rod multiplayer car game is a car driving simulation that you can play with other online racing games enthusiasts around the world. Car games and car simulator players can earn rewards by performing car parking, drifting or checkpoint tasks without internet in the city. Enthusiasts of multiplayer games and car simulation games can make special customizations for the racing car with the prizes they have won and show their cars to other users in the online car game mode.

With the added features, it becomes possible to feel yourself in a real car race in rod multiplayer car games simulator designed by considering all the details for drifting games and racing games. There are twenty different car parking and drift game missions without internet in the city. Online car games and racing games enthusiasts who fulfill these tasks can buy new, fast supercars in the car game with the prizes they have won. At the same time, the most beautiful drifting games and online car games simulator lovers who have completed the twentieth of the drift, car parking and checkpoint missions can win a super car and a police car as a reward.

Reach the finish line as soon as possible before your time runs out in car parking missions and without crashing your racing car into the pontoons. Car parking and car simulator players get rewards when you complete each mission. Car simulator and drift games enthusiasts should pay attention to the time and achieve the desired target drift score at each level while performing challenging drift game missions.

You can have fun with your friends in online mode by joining the endless fun in rod multiplayer car games simulator, which are among the most beautiful drifting games. With many newly added features, you can enjoy car games simulator and racing games without internet. Whether you like 3D car drift racing in street racing or muddying the fenders in car simulator driving mode, ROD Multiplayer car games 2023 game is one of the best drift and 3d city car simulator games you can play.

Fans of multiplayer games and the most beautiful car games will start having fun in the racing game with exciting 3D graphics. Now you can experience extreme racing fun by making the asphalt cry on the streets with ROD Multiplayer Car Games, one of the most beautiful car games and high torque drift car games on your phone. Do you have what it takes to be the best driver in online car games? Show off your skills against other races with ROD Multiplayer Car Games!

Sports Car, Suv Car, Classic Car, Lowriders, 4x4 OffRoad Cars, Police car and more. Customize real high torque drift cars, classic lowriders and 4x4 offroad cars and race on the 3D airport track and collect surprise rewards in the surroundings.

Multiplayer Car Simulator
Race in the online drifting games mode and beat your opponents in real time. Join the live chat fun with online car game and driving game. Race your friends in real racing cars on huge 3d city and mega ramp tracks. Damage your opponent's car with the rocket system in the online car game. The most beautiful drifting games and multiplayer games players who run out of rockets can collect rocket packages located in certain areas of the city with a racing car. These rocket packs can cause damage to all other racing cars in multiplayer and online games mode.

Rod Multiplayer Car Games Simulator Features
● Simulation, Car Drift, Arcade Driving Modes
● Simple and Easy Control and Steering.
● Unlimited fun with 3d Car Drift Game
● Realistic Car Drift Damage
● Japan Car Drift Racing and Russian Car Drift Racing

name: ROD Multiplayer Car Driving

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel i5-2550K, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon R9 290X or Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Get ready for an immersive car racing game with multiplayer car driving. Damage your opponents in multiplayer mode with rockets.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
